nodes.text: Rogen Lithal was a colonel within the Galactic Empire.
During 1 ABY, Rogen resided in the Imperial Detainment Facility in the Imperial Fortress on Yavin 4.
In this facility, the Empire imprisoned six Rebel pilots. During the Remembrance Day festivities of the same year, Wedge Antilles employed a loyal Rebel to rescue the pilots.
The Rebel killed Rogen so that one of the Rebel pilots could sneak out of the base in his uniform.
